# Planet Fitness Tanzania

> Dar es Salaam's premier fitness center offering world-class gym equipment, expert personal trainers, and energising group fitness classes.

## About

Planet Fitness Tanzania is a premium fitness center located at Gymkhana Ground, Garden Avenue, Dar es Salaam, Tanzania. Founded by Ramadhan J Mdula, the gym provides a supportive community environment for fitness enthusiasts of all levels.

## Services

- Full gym access with modern equipment
- Group fitness classes (Spinning, Insanity, Yoga, Aerobics, CrossFit, Tabata, Body Pump, Trampoline, Kata Box, Circuit Training, ABS Challenge)
- Personal training sessions
- Nutrition guidance and diet plans
- Locker room facilities

## Membership Plans

- One Free Day Pass: FREE
- Day Pass: 27,500 TZS ($11 USD)
- 1 Month (Bronze): 218,300 TZS ($85 USD)
- 3 Months (Silver): 619,500 TZS ($240 USD)
- 6 Months (Gold): 1,132,800 TZS ($445 USD)
- 1 Year (Platinum): 2,124,800 TZS ($835 USD)
- Personal Training (per session): 29,500 TZS ($12 USD)
- Senior Discount (60+): 177,000 TZS ($70 USD/month)
- Student Discount (18-25): 177,000 TZS ($70 USD/month)

- Phone: +255 752 080 808

- Instagram: @planetfitnesstz

## Operating Hours

- Monday to Friday: 05:00 - 22:00
- Saturday and Sunday: 07:00 - 19:00
